name: 4 Souls 2 Reap
description:
The reaper finds herself in a post-apocalyptic, barren world. Powerless, hungry for human souls. But there’s not much left of humanity, and what is left, is guarded by angels, fallen from grace. Find your way through this dark hell to feed on souls and regain your strengths.

----------------------------------------------------

4 Souls 2 Reap

This is a fast-paced precision platformer, based on multiple mechanics. Increasing difficulty as you go through the worlds, will you be able to beat the final stage?

----------------------------------------------------

Don't worry! There are a lot of controls, but you'll unlock them one by one! Pause screen in-game has a reminder with controls, too!

Controls:

Movement:

Gamepad: Control Stick / D-pad

Keyboard: A & D / Left Arrow & Right Arrow

Jump:

Gamepad: South Button

Keyboard: Space

Slash (When holding scythe):

Gamepad: East Button

Keyboard: Z

Slowfall (When holding scythe):

Gamepad: D-pad Up / Left Stick Up

Keyboard: W / Up Arrow

Throw (When holding scythe):

Gamepad: East Button

Keyboard: X

Return (When not holding scythe):

Gamepad: East Button

Keyboard: X

Dash:

Gamepad: Right Shoulder

Keyboard: Shift

Teleport (When not holding scythe):

Gamepad: North Button

Keyboard: C
